title: changeIt call with int array parameter passing

content.description: Consider the following two methods that appear within a single class.
content.question: public void changeIt(int[] list, int num) { list = new int[5]; num = 0; for (int x = 0; x < list.length; x++) list[x] = 0; } public void start() { int[] nums = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}; int value = 6; changeIt(nums, value); for (int k = 0; k < nums.length; k++) System.out.print(nums[k] + " "); System.out.print(value); } What is printed as a result of the call start()?

topic.text: 3.6: Methods: Passing and Returning References of an Object

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
